amendment.description: To set aside funding for the Great Lakes fishery and ecosystem restoration program.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1711 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1711 proposed by Senator Domenici for Senator Voinovich. (consideration: CR S11539-11544; text: CR S11541) To set aside funding for the Great Lakes fishery and ecosystem restoration program.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1711 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1711 proposed by Senator Domenici for Senator Voinovich.
